objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='#EFEFEF'/><rect x='0' y='0' width='540' height='540' fill='#E8E8E8'/><rect x='540' y='0' width='540' height='540' fill='#D6D6D6'/><rect x='0' y='540' width='540' height='540' fill='#BEBEBE'/><rect x='540' y='540' width='540' height='540' fill='#ABABAB'/><g opacity='0.3'><path d='M0,0 L1080,1080' stroke='#9E9E9E' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M1080,0 L0,1080' stroke='#9E9E9E' stroke-width='1'/></g><circle cx='270' cy='270' r='200' fill='#D0D0D0' opacity='0.4'/><circle cx='810' cy='810' r='200' fill='#C0C0C0' opacity='0.4'/><g transform='translate(800, 150)'><circle cx='0' cy='0' r='5' fill='#4285F4'/><circle cx='20' cy='0' r='5' fill='#4285F4'/><circle cx='40' cy='0' r='5' fill='#4285F4'/><circle cx='60' cy='0' r='5' fill='#4285F4'/><circle cx='80' cy='0' r='5' fill='#4285F4'/></g><g transform='translate(150, 750)'><circle cx='0' cy='0' r='5' fill='#4285F4'/><circle cx='20' cy='0' r='5' fill='#4285F4'/><circle cx='40' cy='0' r='5' fill='#4285F4'/><circle cx='60' cy='0' r='5' fill='#4285F4'/><circle cx='80' cy='0' r='5' fill='#4285F4'/></g></svg>

objects.text:
• 50MP Camera System
• 8K Video Recording
• Long-lasting Battery
• Powerful AI Features

product_details.description: Plus-up your day with Galaxy AI on Galaxy S24+. Wonder where your favorite influencer got their shoes? Simply Circle to Search* with Google to see where you can buy your own pair. Then snap a photo to show off your new kicks and elevate your pic from good to great on Galaxy S24+.  Before you head out in style, call up that new authentic Japanese restaurant to make a reservation and impress the staff as you use Live Translate* to speak their language in real time. And with our most powerful processor yet, you can smoothly switch between texting friends, taking photos of your food and searching for your next culinary adventure.  With Galaxy AI on GalaxyS24+, life just got a whole lot easier —and a lot more fun. Epic, just like that.

banner_details:
This banner design showcases a premium smartphone with a sleek and modern layout. The background features a quadrant split with neutral shades of grey and subtle diagonal lines, adding depth and sophistication. Two accent circular graphics enhance the modern aesthetic. The header text layer (`heading`) is bold and dominant, displaying the brand and model. Below it, the subheading (`tagline`) emphasizes the product's category. Key features are listed using the `description` text layer. A realistic product image is placed prominently to the right (`product_image`), with pricing presented clearly in bold via the `price` layer. A bright blue call-to-action button (`cta_button`) paired with white text (`cta`) encourages immediate interaction. Blue dot elements add a tech-inspired visual balance.

**Color Palette:**  
- Light Grey: #EFEFEF  
- Cool Grey: #D6D6D6, #E8E8E8, #BEBEBE, #ABABAB  
- Dark Text: #202020, #333333  
- Accent Blue: #4285F4  
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek, modern smartphone with a soft, minimalist color palette. Dominated by a clean **pearl white** body (#F2F2F2), the device communicates sophistication and elegance. The camera lenses in **bold black** (#000000) provide striking contrast, drawing attention to the phone’s high-tech features. The screen features a soft gradient of **warm yellow** (#F8E39A), **light gray** (#D9D9D9), and **shimmering silver tones** (#BABABA), blended seamlessly to create a dreamy, futuristic aura. These colors are both subtle and reflective, enhancing the phone’s premium appeal. For an ad banner, pairing these hues with a sleek, monochrome typeface can maintain the product's classy aesthetic.
